question:
How can I prevent acne?

Choices:
A: Use the same pillowcase every night.
B: Use a fresh pillowcase every night.
steps: Acne can be caused or exacerbated by bacteria, oils, and dirt that come into contact with the skin.
Pillowcases can hold onto bacteria, oils, and dirt from your hair and skin.
If you use the same pillowcase every night, you could be reintroducing these acne-causing agents to your skin repeatedly.
Using a fresh pillowcase every night reduces the chance of coming into contact with acne-causing agents.
